# Climbing, Improved (Ring)
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 5th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 10,000 gp

**Weight** —

As a *[[Climbing (Ring)|ring of climbing]]*, except it grants a +10 competence bonus on its wearer’s [[Climb (Skill)|Climb]] checks.

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], creator must have 10 ranks in the [[Climb (Skill)|Climb]] skill

**Cost** 5,000 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 479
